#summary This page provides help for Administrators / End Users to configure and use the site according to their business requirements.

= Administrators / End Users !RoadMap =

http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/administrators.png

The following are the identified tasks that an end user or Administration can perform on the created site.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/AnonymousAccess Set Anonymous access on site]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyingImages Modifying Site Logo and other images]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyingSiteContent Modifying Site Content]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/CreatePages Create internal pages using Custom Page layouts]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ConfigListHeaderFooter Using Configuration list to:]
    # Update the Contact Us header value
    # Update the Footer value

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/QueryUsWebPart Using Query Us Web Part to:]
    # Configure Web Part properties to send mail to administrators or other users
    # Configure Mail templates from Configuration list to send Admin mail or self mails.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyTheme Modify the theme.]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifySiteElements Modify Site elements (MasterPage, CSS, JavaScript)]
